reviews.text: I hired soft play for my son's first birthday and they were fantastic! The soft play and ball pit were great and in perfect condition. The girls set everything up for me and packed it up afterwards. Everything went really smoothly and I would highly recommend them.
We had a wonderful experience renting the ball pit and softplay area from Kidzplay Cafe. Brilliant service and so reliable, they really helped make my sons birthday party special. Thank you!

Kidz play cafe hosted a fab birthday party for my daughters. Responsive and helpful on planning and amazing help during the party. Great venue, loved the packed lunches and good quality toys. We will be back for your pop up play dates. Thank you!

I have to say that my toddler loves coming here because of the different varieties of toys and the space.
The staff is always lovely and smiley even when sometimes you can see the tiredness on their faces.

Visited several times now. Very well thought out events for young children. Facilities she very clean and the staff go above and beyond and are always more than happy to help. I would highly recommend.

address: 152 Station Rd, London E4 6AN, United Kingdom
